name: Find URLs in text
description: Finds urls beginning with:http://https://www.If the URL ends with a dot, it gets excluded.Examples:http://www.google.huhttp://www.google.hu.http://translate.google.com/translate?js=y&prev=_t&hl=en&ie=UTF-8&layout=1&eotf=1&u=http%3A%2F%2Flivedocs.adobe.com%2Fflex%2F3%2Fhtml%2Fhelp.html%3Fcontent%3D12_Using_Regular_Expressions_06.html%23134893&sl=es&tl=en
author: sydd
